ABOUT.LABEL: Who I Am
ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.DETAILS: Write some information about yourself that is IT related. Why are you passionate about coding? What is your source of inspiration for improving your programming skills?
ABOUT.LOCATION: Where are you based? Would you be open to working remotely or potentially relocating?
ABOUT.LEARNING: Show that you are open-minded. Are you enthusiastic about learning new technologies and continually improving your skills?
ABOUT.PROBLEM_SOLVING: A brief description of your problem-solving approach. Do you learn from each challenge as you search for the most efficient or elegant solution? You can include some keywords like analytical thinking, creativity, persistence, and collaboration.

CONTACT.HEADING: Contact Me
CONTACT.QUESTION: Got a problem to solve?
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Encourage people to contact you and describe what role you are interested in. Show that you will add value to their projects through your work.
CONTACT.MESSAGE_ERROR: You must fill in the field.
CONTACT.PRIVACY_LABEL2: and agree to the processing of my data.
CONTACT.PRIVACY_ERROR: You must agree to the privacy policy.
CONTACT.SUCCESS: Thanks! I’ll get back to you soon

TECHNOLOGIES.TITLE: Technologies
TECHNOLOGIES.DESCRIPTION: A short introduction of your skills. Highlight your experience of using different front-end technologies and emphasise your openness to learning and adapting to new technologies. Show how important it is for you to keep up with the rapid changes in web development.
TECHNOLOGIES.QUESTION: You need another skill?
TECHNOLOGIES.CONTACT_NOTE: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

PROJECTS.SUBTITLE: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

DESCRIPTION.PROJECT1: Pekomen is a simple and modern app to present and manage creative projects. It’s responsive, multilingual, and supports live demos and tech stacks.
DESCRIPTION.PROJECT2: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
DESCRIPTION.PROJECT3: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

LEGAL.SCOPE_OWNERSHIP: Scope and Ownership of the Product

It is intended for educational purposes only and not for extensive personal or commercial use. Therefore, we cannot guarantee consistent performance, reliability, security, or any specific quality attributes.

LEGAL.USE_PRODUCT_TEXT: This Portfolio is intended to be used for lawful purposes only, in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations. Any use of the Portfolio for illegal activities, or to harass, harm, threaten, or intimidate others, is strictly prohibited. You are solely responsible for your interactions with other users of the Portfolio.

LEGAL.INDEMNITY_TEXT: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the listed students, the Developer Akademie, and their affiliates, partners, officers, directors, agents, and employees from any claim, demand, loss, damage, cost, or liability (including reasonable legal fees) arising out of or related to your use of the Portfolio and/or your breach of this Legal Notice.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: Protecting your personal data is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how Portfolio collects, processes, and stores personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable European data protection laws.
privacyPolicy.dataWeCollect: When you visit or use Portfolio, we may collect the following data:
dataWeCollectList: Information you provide directly (e.g., contact forms, email inquiries)
Technical data automatically collected (e.g., IP address, browser type, device information)
Usage data (e.g., pages visited, time spent on the website)
privacyPolicy.purpose: We process your data only for the following purposes:
purposeList: To respond to inquiries and provide requested services
To improve our website and services
privacyPolicy.legalBasis: The legal bases for processing your personal data are:
legalBasisList: Performance of a contract or pre-contractual measures (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR)
Legitimate interests pursued by us (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR)
privacyPolicy.dataSharing: We do not sell or rent your personal data. We may share your data with trusted third parties only to:
dataSharingList: Provide technical support or website services
Comply with legal obligations or governmental requests
privacyPolicy.dataStorage: Personal data will be stored only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy or as required by law.
privacyPolicy.yourRights: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
yourRightsList: Right to access your personal data
Right to correct or update your data
Right to request deletion of your data ("Right to be forgotten")
Right to restrict or object to processing
Right to withdraw consent at any time
Right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority
privacyPolicy.cookies: Our website may use cookies to improve user experience and analyze traffic. You can manage cookie preferences via your browser settings.
privacyPolicy.thirdParty: Portfolio may use third-party services such as analytics or hosting providers. These services may collect or process personal data. We ensure that all third-party services comply with GDPR requirements.
privacyPolicy.changes: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated date. We recommend checking this page regularly.
privacyPolicy.questions: For questions regarding your personal data, please contact us at amer.alkhaldi@icloud.com
